Posts.Content: Apr 27, 2010 08:11PM grandmaguns wrote: I have never had a reaction to zometa and have been on it monthly since November 2008.  I do get two tylenol before treatment and sometimes the treatment falls on the same day as my Herceptin treatment.  I do feel drowsy after the Herceptin mainly because of the Benadryl  tablet I get then.  You might be having an allergic reaction and should report it to your doctor.  My dentist wrote all over my chart sayinng ZOMETA to watch for jaw problems.
Posts.Title: 1st Zometa infusion-----ARGGGGGH Chickadee cmhartley
